# hospEpi

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of hospEpi is to provide useful function for epidemiological analyses in a hospital setting.

## Installation

You can install the development version of hospEpi like so:

``` r
devtools::install_github("npeters1322/hospEpi")
```
